name: 張素薰
objective: 本課程目的在啟發學生英語聽力，分析及思辨能力。本課程自報紙，雜誌及電視選取豐富的新聞及媒體教材, 以訓練聽力及筆記的技巧。 此外，在課堂上將討論一些有爭議性的或者有趣的議題，以培養學生獨立思辨能力。
schedule:
Syllabus for 4E1 Multimedia English Listening and Speaking, 
2014(2)一零二學年度第二學期
Week	Classification 	English News	Friends
1	Introduction
2	Health	1.	Health officials seek new 
solutions as rabies continues to spread (2013/08/13)	1
3		2.	Toxicologist Lin Chieh-liang
leaves behind important legacy (2013/08/05)	2
4	Politics	3.	Court rules against family
opposed to forced demolition (2013/12/12)	3
5		4.	Ministry will decide whether to 
appeal Dapu case within 20 days (2014/01/09)	Stage Play
6	Business	5. Local printing company makes a splash with lavish year-end party (2014/01/13)	4
7		6. Popular Lunar New Year foods contain high amounts of preservatives, sweeteners (2014/01/06)	5
8	Life	7. Finance minister warns of potential property bubble in Taiwan (2014/01/02)	6
9		Powerpoint Presentation
10		8. Food vendors along Xinyi line to benefit from New Year’s Eve crowds (2013/12/30)	7
11	Society	9. New measure protects workers from overwork and illness (2013/06/18)	8
12		10. Government considers revisions that would allow surrogate pregnancy (2013/12/17)	9
13	Education	11. Opinions mixed on 12-year compulsory education (2013/06/11)	Demonstration
14		12. Parents grapple with and find fault with sweeping education changes (2013/06/28)	10
15	Traffic	13. National Freeway Bureau addresses eTag concerns (2014/01/15)	11
16		14. Arrival of YouBike in New Taipei City could spell early demise of Newbike (2014/01/08)	12
17		Powerpoint Presentation
18	Final Report
scorePolicy:
Evaluation:
1.	Weekly Tests and appearance, one absence being reduced two points. 80%
2.	Presentations and Reports. 20%
